title: Person Of Interest You Shouldn't Have Done That (Season 3 Episode 4)
author: xFastHax
comment: The best thing with Bear is that there is no dislike when he's in the video. Bear, you're awesome :)
"We're just a couple of concerned dog owners." Classic
Those soulful eyes and the way he licks the assailant after taking him down … Bear is irresistibly adorable!
She's like "you just saved my life. How could I ever repay you?" and Finch is like: "dog toy!"
when i first saw this episode i was scared cause i though something was really wrong with bear but thank goodness there wasn't
